message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be worth the investment for you. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's close this deal!
I understand you're willing to come down to $10,500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
